bioconda.name: ananse
bioconda.summary: ANANSE: ANalysis Algorithm for Networks Specified by Enhancers - Prediction of key transcription factors in cell fate determination using enhancer networks

biocontainers.name: ananse
biocontainers.summary: Ananse: analysis algorithm for networks specified by enhancers - prediction of key transcription factors in cell fate determination using enhancer networks

biotools.summary: ANANSE is a computational approach to infer enhancer-based gene regulatory networks (GRNs) and to use these GRNs to identify the key transcription factors in cell fate determination.

bioschemas.name: ANANSE
bioschemas.summary: ANANSE is a computational approach to infer enhancer-based gene regulatory networks (GRNs) and to use these GRNs to identify the key transcription factors in cell fate determination.
